title: pigo configuration
description: Configuration file for the pigo AI coding assistant CLI.

$schema.description: Path to the JSON Schema file.

api_key.description: OpenAI API key. Can also be set via OPENAI_API_KEY env var.

base_url.description: API endpoint URL. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

model.description: Model name to use. Defaults to gpt-4o.

api_type.description: OpenAI API mode. Defaults to chat.

plugins.description: List of plugin names to enable (must be defined in plugins.json).
